title: How to Ask Someone to Kiss You

steps.title: If you had a really good time on your date, tell them that!
steps.content: If you had a really good time on your date, tell them that! Then, follow up with the question about a kiss. Try something like: “This was so much fun, thanks for taking me out tonight. Would it be okay if I kissed you?” “I had a really good time tonight, I hope we can see each other again. Can I kiss you?”

steps.title: With this option, there’s no way your date can misunderstand you.
steps.content: With this option, there’s no way your date can misunderstand you. Keep it straight and to the point so your date knows what you’re after. [1] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. For example: [2] X Research source “Can I kiss you?” “Would it be okay if I kissed you now?”

steps.title: Your date’s probably nervous too!
steps.content: Your date’s probably nervous too! You can ask them indirectly with a cute question that shows off your vulnerability. Try something like: [3] X Research source “I’d really love to kiss you now, but I’m too nervous to even ask!” “Here comes the nerve-wracking part: can I kiss you?”

steps.title: Try some humor to lighten the mood.
steps.content: Try some humor to lighten the mood. You can ask your question in a fun, flirty way to let your date know that you’re cool and casual. [4] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. Try something like: [5] X Research source “Welcome to kissville: population, us?” “Are you thinking what I’m thinking?”

steps.title: You always want to make sure your date is feeling the romantic mood as much as you are.
steps.content: You always want to make sure your date is feeling the romantic mood as much as you are. If you can’t tell, simply ask them with a question like: [6] X Research source “I would love to kiss you right now, if you’re into it. Is that okay?” “How comfortable would you be with kissing right now?”

steps.title: If you’re picking up on flirtatious body language, ask your date if they’d like to kiss you.
steps.content: If you’re picking up on flirtatious body language, ask your date if they’d like to kiss you. You can inject a little humor into the situation so it doesn’t seem as serious, too. [7] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. Try something like: [8] X Research source “You want to kiss me, don’t you?” “I can tell that you want to kiss me right now.” “If you’re going to ask me about a kiss, the answer is yes.”

steps.title: This will give you a good indication of your date’s comfort levels.
steps.content: This will give you a good indication of your date’s comfort levels. You can get specific or leave it broad to get an idea of what your date wants to do. Try something like: [9] X Research source “Would you like me to lean in and kiss you right now?” “How would you like to end this date?”

steps.title: Being bold is a turn-on for most people.
steps.content: Being bold is a turn-on for most people. If you’re tired of beating around the bush, just tell your date straight up that you’re open to a kiss. For example: [10] X Research source “I want you to kiss me.” “Please kiss me now.”

steps.title: Build anticipation by turning your date’s attention toward your mouth.
steps.content: Build anticipation by turning your date’s attention toward your mouth. Put on some chapstick or lipstick while you’re chatting to get their mind racing. [11] X Research source This is a more subtle way to hint at kissing, and not everyone will get the message. You should follow up with a direct question to make sure, like, “Do you want to kiss me?” or, “Can I kiss you now?”

steps.title: You can ask for a kiss with your body language if you’re confident enough.
steps.content: You can ask for a kiss with your body language if you’re confident enough. If you’re saying goodbye to your date, step in closer to them to signal that you’re going in for a kiss. [12] X Research source If your date keeps making eye contact with you and doesn’t step away, they’re probably open for a kiss. If your date takes a step backward or won’t meet your eyes, back off a little. The best way to avoid confusion is to ask with your words. If you aren’t sure what your date wants, just ask!

steps.title: You can get a feel for their comfort levels through a flirty text.
steps.content: You can get a feel for their comfort levels through a flirty text. Try sending a message that tells them how much you want to kiss them, then see if they respond well. For example: [13] X Research source “I just bought some new lipstick. Fancy a taste?” “I really wish I was kissing you right now.” “I want to kiss you.”
